```{python}
import random
import itertools
```

```{python}
#elements that reels 1 to 3 can assume
N1 = 10
N2 = 11
N3 = 5

#reels 1 to 3
x1 = list(range(1,N1 + 1))
x2 = list(range(1,N2 + 1))
x3 = list(range(1,N3 + 1))

num_combinations = N1*N2*N3
combinations= list(itertools.product(x1, x2, x3))
```
